subject: Re: Spirico Device
author: Guy
full_text:
In regards to the Spiricom story - I have to assume you're referring to 
the Mark IV model as diagrammed/written up in the Spiricom manual (as 
opposed to the INCORRECT diagram made by Polish researcher Wojciech 
Drewniak...http://www.worlditc.org/k_06_spiricom.htm ).

While my research is still not finished (and I've been working on this 
for a little over 2 years), I'm leaning toward the Mark IV 
conversations as having been hoaxed by Bill O'Neil. HOWEVER - I believe 
he acted alone and that none of the other members of the Metascience 
Foundation were involved with this hoax. As to O'Neil's motivation for 
the hoax - I still don't know. But I will also say that the veridical 
evidence that O'Neil claims to have received about Dr. George J. 
Mueller through clairaudience is amazing and it is tough to see how 
O'Neil would have gotten this information given his finances, location, 
the timeframe, etc.

I've been promising to get my personal website up and operating for 
some time now but have been busy. Hopefully soon. Then I'll start 
posting what I have found out so far.

Guy Jackson

P.S. The recordings of the Spiricom cassette that can be found at the 
GOS website ( http://www.ghostpix.com/spiricom/spiricom.html ) are very 
poor. Scott L over at Ghostly Talk pulled much a much cleaner version 
directly from a source cassette provided to him by Mark Macy ( see 
Ghostly Talk show archive noted as a "Bonus" and "Repost" for August 
22, 2006: http://www.ghostlytalk.com/node/616 ).
